reviews.text:
Stopped here on a whim, looking for some summer rolls or something comparable that is fresh and light!

This is my first experience of building my own "Pho bowl" that offer in 6-1 Pho. For the pho bowl, you can select the broth and then the protein. As you...
My friend ordered me some 6-1-Pho while I was home sick (so thoughtful!), and it just hit the spot.  The first thing I want when I'm sick is a big bowl of...
